text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Sigh……

On the day off, I saw Maya. It seems 
that she doesn't have the same usual energy on her……
choice_data_list: (What happened……?)
(What happened……?)

text_block_list.name: Maya's Friend A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's Maya-chan! Hey, we were just talking about going shopping 
for clothes, do you want to join us?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Hmm… sorry～ I'll pass for today～. I'm going out now.

text_block_list.name: Maya's Friend B
text_block_list.text: Going out? T… to where?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I'm going to see an airplane～

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh…… trainer-chan.
choice_data_list: You don't look well. What's wrong?
You don't look well. What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ……Hey, more importantly, are you free today?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Or are you not…… free today?

Mayano Top Gun seemed to want me to stay with her, 
so I decided to go with her.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Landing!! Hehe, we're here～♪ It's a little far from 
school, but this place is nice!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Woah, look-look! A Jetliner! 
And…… Wow! There's a Beluga too!
choice_data_list: Beluga is another name for shiroiruka(beluga whale), right?
Beluga is another name for shiroiruka(beluga whale), right?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that white, big-headed guy is called Beluga! 
They are shaped like that because 
they are airplanes that carry airplanes.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
We're lucky to see one because they are rare♪ 
Oh yeah, let's take a picture of them!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Three, two, one.…… Yay☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Yeah, it looks great☆ 
They always look so cute～!
choice_data_list: I didn't know you liked airplanes so much.
I didn't know you liked airplanes so much.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Because, because! They can fly in the sky 
full of excitement!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Of course, I will like them～!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
You know, Maya's papa loves airplanes too. 
He loves it so much that he became a pilot!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
So on my days off, I would often come to the airport 
and watch the planes and look around the stores…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
choice_data_list: What's up?
What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ah…… mmmn! It's nothing.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
More importantly, Maya is starving! The food here 
is delicious～, let's go eat something!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
And then, and then, after we're full, 
let's look around more!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
We should go shopping first! 
I want to buy some souvenirs for my friends.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
For Mabe-chan, Teio-chan, also Yukippe and 
Biko-chan. Flower-chan, and……
choice_data_list: You have a lot of friends.
You have a lot of friends.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehe～, that's right!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……we're wasting time standing still! 
Let's get to it, trainer-chan!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I will call it "Maya-chin Adventure - Airport Edition"! Take-Oooooff!

After that, Mayano Top Gun and I enjoyed ourselves 
eating at the airport and exploring the stores.
Then―

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Oh…… It's already time?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It'll take a while to get back to school…… 
I have a curfew, so I have to go back soon……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Sigh……
choice_data_list: (She's not energetic at all……)
(She's not energetic at all……)

text_block_list.text:
As I was pondering how I could cheer her up, I suddenly saw the 
"Beluga" she had mentioned earlier.

It appears to be heading for the runway 
and will be taking off shortly. So―
choice_data_list: Mayano, why don't we go to the observation deck?
Mayano, would you like to go to the observation deck?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Eh, why? 
……Ah!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: The Beluga, it's taking off……!! I want to see!!
choice_data_list: If you pass the curfew, I'll go apologize with you.
If you pass the curfew, I'll go apologize with you.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Trainer-chan……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
―Yeah! 
To the observation deck, Take-Oooooff!!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Woah～～～! Woah woah woah! 
Trainer-chan, did you see!?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Just like the name "Beluga", it was 
like a dolphin swimming in the sky～!

―Mayano Top Gun on the observation deck 
was a bright and energetic figure.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Thank God～ we're just in time for curfew!!
choice_data_list: Well, it was worth the rush.
Well, it was worth the rush.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'm going to end my day with a smile on my face☆

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
……Today was really really fun! 
I really, really enjoyed it.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
There is no…… papa or mama at the school. 
I get queasy sometimes thinking about that.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
But I have lo～～～ts of friends, 
and besides―I have you!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe…… Let's go on 
"Maya-chin Adventure" together again!

Mayano Top Gun waved cheerfully as 
she headed back to her dormitory.
